====Checkout latest release====
{{{
svn checkout http://phpquery.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ phpQuery
}}}
====Checkout developer branch====
{{{
svn checkout http://phpquery.googlecode.com/svn/branches/dev/ phpQuery-dev
}}}

You can directly [http://code.google.com/p/phpquery/source/browse/ browse the code] using web interface.

SVN changelog is also available thou [http://code.google.com/p/phpquery/source/list web interface] and also as [http://code.google.com/feeds/p/phpquery/svnchanges/basic RSS].

Get SVN for Windows from [http://tortoisesvn.tigris.org/ TortoiseSVN].
